definitions: The action of attaching a tag or label to something.
The act of following closely behind someone or something.
The act of marking a surface with graffiti.
The process of adding metadata to a file or item.
examples: The tagging of the luggage made it easy to identify.
He was tagging along with his older brother.
The police are investigating the recent tagging on the bridge.
The tagging of photos helps with organization.
